name: Whispers Through the Wall
description:
Whispers Through the Wall is our Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022 Submission!

Please note that this is only the teaser version/demo and not a complete project.

When Maria meets a stranger on her balcony, her winter holidays grow a little warmer…

This project is a short otome game featuring themes of loneliness and self-discovery.

It has a single love interest named Jamie, a young chef who is between jobs.

Team Credits:

Lead Developer - Sam Kerr - Twitter

Composer- Dalton Attig - Twitter

CG + Sprite Artist - MintsTea  - Twitter

CG + Sprite Artist - Vaniraaa - Twitter

Background Artist - Ari Angga - Twitter
